modName: Skyrim Redone Dragon Bone Ebonsteel Armor Patch
summary: Armor Rating Upgrade for Skyrim Redone's ReProcessor mod plugin
descriptionHtml:
Increases the ratings of all armor pieces in the DragonBoneEbonsteel armor mod to put them above the ratings of the armors in the Skyrim Redone overhaul mod, making this armor the most powerful armor in the game now. It's a bit tougher then Daedric armor, as the ebony parts in these armors help reinforce the dragon bone plating.Â 


New Armor Ratings

Armor: 160
Gauntlets: 55
Boots: 55
Helmets: 80
Hood: 20
Shield: 90


Mods used to make this and their ownershttp://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9286/? T3nd0http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24941/? Dreogan
author: lewisroantree
